Class: EmbeddedContext

(protected) EmbeddedContext(engine, identity, eventSink, installedBusinessNetwork)

A class representing the current request being handled by the JavaScript engine.

Constructor

(protected) new EmbeddedContext(engine, identity, eventSink, installedBusinessNetwork)

Constructor.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
engine Engine

The owning engine.
identity Object

The current identity.
eventSink EventEmitter

The event emitter
installedBusinessNetwork InstalledBusinessNetwork

The installed business network
